text: Location of Cameroon There are about 1,400 known moth species of Cameroon. The moths (mostly nocturnal) and butterflies (mostly diurnal) together make up the taxonomic order Lepidoptera. This is a list of moth species which have been recorded in Cameroon. ==Alucitidae== *Alucita illuminatrix (Meyrick, 1929) *Alucita megaphimus (Hering, 1917) ==Anomoeotidae== *Anomoeotes instabilis
